sync_players_menu_message: ğŸ”„ Character Synchronization This command automatically updates all your imported Pathbuilder characters. âš ï¸ Important: For updates to be available, you need to export again in Pathbuilder (the ID doesn't change). ğŸ“‹ Process: 1. Open your character in Pathbuilder2e 2. Click 'Export' â†’ 'Export to JSON' 3. Wait for confirmation 4. Run synchronization here ğŸ”„ All characters with Pathbuilder ID will be updated automatically.
editplayer_menu_prompt: ğŸ› ï¸ Let's edit an existing character!
editplayer_instructions: Click the button below to start or use the quick commands.
editplayer_input_prompt: ğŸ› ï¸ Enter the edit command in the format: Name attribute=value [attribute2=value2...] Examples: â€¢ "Rurik" level=10 â€¢ "Lyra" name="New Lyra" className=sorcerer â€¢ "Theron" acrobatics=12 athletics=15 Editable attributes: name, alias, className, level, perception, fortitude, reflex, will, skills (acrobatics, arcana, athletics, crafting, deception, diplomacy, intimidation, medicine, nature, occultism, performance, religion, society, stealth, survival, thievery) Type 'cancel' to exit.
editplayer_description: Edit attributes of existing characters with support for multiple updates.

cleardata_instructions: âš ï¸ Warning: This action will permanently remove all your registered characters. ğŸ“‹ What will be removed: â€¢ All imported characters â€¢ All manually created characters â€¢ Level, skill, and stat data â€¢ Pathbuilder connections ğŸ”’ What will NOT be removed: â€¢ Your user profile â€¢ Bot settings âš ï¸ This action cannot be undone!
